name: Introduction to Creative Writing
description: An introductory course that covers the fundamentals of creative writing, with a focus on developing a writer's voice and understanding the key elements of the craft.

name: Composition and Creative Writing
description: A course that covers the basics of composition and creative writing, with a focus on developing the ability to write in a variety of genres.

name: Creative Writing: Fiction
description: A course that covers the fundamentals of writing fiction, with a focus on the elements of storytelling, character development, and plot structure.

name: Creative Writing: Poetry
description: A course that covers the fundamentals of writing poetry, with a focus on poetic forms, imagery, and meter.

name: Creative Writing: Children's Writing
description: A course that covers the fundamentals of writing for children, with a focus on developing the skills necessary to create stories, books, and other works for young readers.
